response.overview: Set in Brooklyn, “A Love Letter to M” paints a contemporary portrait of love on Max (André Holland) and Sasha's (Phoebe Tonkin) wedding day. Poetically exploring the idea that family and belonging are choices we make, this is a modern-day love story with a happy ending.
response.tagline: Set in Brooklyn, NY, this is a modern day love story with a happy ending.
response.title: A Love Letter to M
